item.title: Mountain Crest Acquisition Corp III 10-K
item.description: Mountain Crest Acquisition Corp III, which is in the Blank Checks [6770] industry, SEC 10-K filing on March 07, 2022 had 22841 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: business - 422 instances company - 354 instances combination - 340 instances shares - 301 instances 2021 - 226 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
